content.detailedDescription: I was smoking a cig outside the place i'm staying at and i was looking at the sky kinda and seen a red thing move in the sky and thought it was weird to see something like that in my area so i ran and got the person i live with and he came out and the object was moving straight with fire/light underneath it going in and out then it got to far away and couldn't see what it was. we believed that it was a ufo. oh and my phone died afterwards for a minute when it had a full battery.
content.summary: It was red with fire or light underneath it going in a straight format.

content.detailedDescription: I was smoking a cig outside the place i'm staying at and i was looking at the sky kinda and seen a red thing move in the sky and thought it was weird to see something like that in my area so i ran and got the person i live with and he came out and the object was moving straight with fire/light underneath it going in and out then it got to far away and couldn't see what it was. we believed that it was a ufo. oh and my phone died afterwards for a minute when it had a full battery.

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were on our way home to spring valley az. from a funeral in california. we pulled off the road to take a small break out in the middle of nowhere. the location is 5 miles north of jarnel, az. on hwy 89. it was a little past 11:00 pm. we somehow started talking about ufo. i mentioned to my son, 12 years old at the time that i think most ufo sightings are military related or non- military related vehicles possibly from the future like a time machine. i told my son that some day time travel could be possible. he asked if i could prove time travel. i said maybe, do you want to try it. well it's oct. 8 1994 11:26pm we are 5 miles north of jarnel on hwy 89 waiting for a time machine. we both said if anything happens we will remember this date and time. oh my god what is that my son yells out. i turn my head and it comes right up to us, approx. 100' from us. a small vehicle 50' off the ground looking right at us. we could see two people in the craft, they were looking at us. sheldon looked at me at jumped into the car and shut the door. i stood still and took it all in. after about 5 seconds i waved and they waved back. i looked back at my son and he smiled. when i turned back to look at the craft it was backing up i waved again and they waved too. the craft turned, picked up speed and altitude and within a matter of seconds was out of sight. i got in the car looked at my son and he said that was me dad, from the future. you did it you proved time travel to me. we drove off in a daze. we stopped at the nearest payphone and called home. i told my wife, what just happened and we would be home soon. when we got home my son was still shaken by the event and told his mom and his sister that he came back from the future in a time machine that dad builds. we have a plaque on the wall with the date time and place. i have some ideas that might speed up the development of time travel. we are also considering an attemp at producing a movie. if you find our story interesting and would like to get more details, let me know.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Out in the middle of nowhere and a ufo showed up.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside and something told me to look up, and that's when i saw a orange color with a red glow. i told my husband look up and his like what is that never seen anything like that before. then it just disappeared.
content.summary: Very bright orange glow with red

content.detailedDescription: Driving down a back road, my girlfriend and i saw two glowing disc-shaped objects/lights about 7-10 inches in diameter (not too bright) come into view from far upper right and descend from at least tree top level, to about four feet off the ground.  during the descent, they closed from what seemed like ten feet apart to headlight distance apart, then remained at this height and distance apart for about two seconds.  they seemed to be spinning, and during the entire experience were moving rapidly directly toward the car at what seemed like at least automobile speed, then right when i thought i was about to "hit a ghost car head on" and went for the brakes, these lights/objects made it right up to the lowest part of the windshield and then seemed to go through the car, leaving a physical and mental feeling that i really hit something (or more like it went through us).  it felt like a wave went through our bodies and almost felt like we died for a second.  this was a back road in the pine barrens, with no objects around to cause reflection or anything of the sort.  there were no lights on or cell phone on inside the car either, i know because i've been trying to find any sort of logical explanation, but i have nothing. there was no water around, no fog,just a dark road, and these...Things.
content.summary: Two glowing lights/objects descended  to eye level

content.detailedDescription:
While camping at millinocket lake with my older brother and our respective children i and then my brother observed a white light making unbelievable maneuvers at an extremely high altitude and then seemingly cruise right out into space.

the encounter started after the kids had gone into the camper trailer to get ready for bed while my brother and i picked up the camp site.  as my brother was burning some trash in the fire, i walked over the hood of the truck and gazed off into the clear, star-filled cloudless night to see if i could observe some more satellites that we had shown the kids approximately 30 minutes earlier.

as i was looking off to the western sky, with mount katahdin and millinocket lake to my right i observed what i first thought to be a jet steadily flying towards the east at an extremely high altitude.  after watching it for a moment i quickly dismissed the thought that it was a jet due to its��� fast rate of travel across the sky and yet conversely dismissed it as being a satellite due its��� slow rate of travel.  essentially what i witnessed was traveling faster and higher than a commercial jet but slower and lower than the satellites that we had observed earlier in the evening with the kids.

i continued to watch for another minute thinking to myself that this light or object must be a couple hundred miles or further away from my present location.  as i watched it moving steadily across the sky it stopped!  it stopped!!  i had to blink my eyes because i thought that i was seeing things.  but sure enough the bright object had just stopped and then just when i got my brain around that fact the object accelerated straight down in the blink of an eye in what i would estimate to be 5 ��� 10 miles judging from its��� distance.

as soon as it reached a lower altitude it immediately changed direction and shot diagonally (make a v) up to what appeared to be its��� original elevation in about two (2) seconds and continued on its easterly cruise at a speed relative to the speed before it stopped and dropped.

my jaw hit the hood of the truck and i stammered for my brother to come over to where i was.  i said man you gotta see this! 

right after i called out to my brother it performed the same exact maneuver again, stopped, dropped 5-10 miles and then shot back up at an angle to the original altitude all in a matter of 5 seconds.  amazing!!

my brother came over to my side and i pointed out the object in the sky to him and told him to watch.  again, the same maneuver was executed.  we were both dumb struck.  in my mind and our opinion this was no plane, nor tele-communications satellite, nor space station, nor swamp gas, nor car headlight reflecting off the swamp gas.  this was a high speed vehicle (lets use the term ufo) performing some amazing maneuvers in the northern maine july sky.  awesome!

this activity continued for a couple more maneuvers (think w shaped) and then the object which, although getting closer to yet still many miles away from decided to maintain a steady course with a slight incline towards our left.  in other words the object appeared to be heading towards us yet turning towards outerspace.

we continued to watch this object (white light) for approximately 25-30 minutes as it seemingly flew straight out into space and disappeared.

the entire show lasted for approximately 30 minutes.  unlike a satellite which scream across the sky in a matter of several seconds
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Zig zagging white light in northern maine

content.detailedDescription:
Filed by asd for the witness, who wishes to remain anonymous: 

the witness, who was an assistant fire chief at the time, was prompted to contact mufon after seeing a tv program on the illinois sightings in theyhear 2000. he stated that he was returning from a house fire in st. clair, missouri at approximately 3:00 am and was on i-44 highway approaching union, missouri when he heard law enforcement on the county police band radio discussing an unidentified object.  the dispatcher said ���oh it's this roswell stuff again.��� and that police were chasing the object.  

as the witness approached 50 hwy and 47 hwy he saw a large triangular craft with lights pointing down over the wal-mart that was traveling at approximately 25-30 mph.  the witness said that the very bright lights on the object pointed downward, but did not light up the ground, seeming to stop approximately 100' feet up.  the craft was approximately 500' above the ground. 

the witness joined up with an officer from union, missouri and an officer from the county, and the three of them followed the object in their separate cars for approximately one hour as the object headed towards washington, missouri, north of the original position.  the object was always in front of them or above them. at one point, the county officer attempted to tilt his dash cam up in order to get pictures, but it would not move into the needed position. 

none of the men had a camera with them. the object stopped and hovered several times and moved very slowly.  they were unable to use the radio for communication while the craft was above them. after an hour, the officers needed to turn back to get back to other calls, so this witness left as well. by this time, the object had moved into an area se of washington, mo over farmland where there were no roads, and it was impossible to follow.  
__________________________________

the witness surmises that the object from illinois continued into missouri and officers picked up its trail after it crossed the state line.
content.summary: Triagular craft january 2000 may be part of mass sightings in illinois

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo hovering and morphing under dense rain clouds. disk like, looked as though it was slowly rolling and flipping head over heels. drifted away until clouds obscured view.
definitely not a bird, plane or helicopter. had a faint torsion field (for lack of better words) around the object. 

 i was in my backyard looking southeast of oakhurst, ga. looking up at the beautiful rain clouds when i spotted the object. it caught my eye because it stood out as something obviously anomalous.
content.summary: Morphing ufo

content.detailedDescription: was hanging out in the back yard  with 6 people and all of a sudden looked up to see a bright light that then changed in to three bright fire balls looking things ,that spun around looked as if they where playing , after a short while of staring they stopped all got togther and then one by one started  flying up in to the blackness of the sky and everyone was saying thats not normal thats a ufo  and i belive it had to be it was not  anything i have seen before.
content.summary: 3 orange bright lights kinda like a fire ball

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving down the street to take my daughter to the store ,i observed some red lights ,i thought they were lights from a tower ,but they were moving toward us ,i was just wondering what it was ,i pulled up to my house and picked up my other daughter ,we rode back down the street to see if we could still see the lights ,we didnt see them right off,then we saw them they were like stacked on top of each other but not touching ,then they formed a triangle i was trying to get my daughter to get it on video but she couldnt get them because they may have been to far away for the camera,she was screaming get in the car they gone get us ,she was panicking so we got in the car and went to quick trip,we couldnt see them past the trees so we drove back up the street ,i saw a police car and went to ask him if he had saw the lights he said no,i told him to be on the look out ,i called 911 when i first saw the lights and the operator was like whta do  you want us to do ,i told her i dont know i was just telling them what i saw i headed back toward my house didnt see them anymore pulled up in my driveway and decided to sit outside to see  if we would see them again ,and within two mins of pulling up they were back ,this time the were like in a line ,as the almost got out of view the  one inthe back closest to us dissappeared then the middleone then the first one ,within another fifteen mins they were back again ,coming from the east heading northwest ,this went on from about 10:00 pm to 12:30am we saw them a total of six times
i decided to come in the house around 12:30 it had beena little while since our last sighting  it wasnt  a helicopter or a plane there was no sound i dont know what they were but i know what they werent.
content.summary: There were three orbs of light moving to the east ,once they went past us within 15 mins they were coming from the east again

content.detailedDescription:
We was 5 persons. we was at beach and we saw 3 luminous object at the sky. his disposition was on triangle. one of this 3 objects did a very violent, fast and abstract movements in the sky. there was no pattern. we were talking about what we saw, and we all saw the same thing.

i saw a lot of meteorites, i can recognize it, but these 3 objects were not meteorites.

greetings from spain.
content.summary: Three objects at the sky with violent, fast and abstract movements.

content.detailedDescription:
This was seen by me and my cousin as kids. we were playing in front of my aunt's/uncles's with my grandmother's behind us. our family lived next door to each other. we noticed a light ball, red orange clingfilm around their chimney & frightened us since never seeing anything like it. it appeared to be intelligent. it would go around the chimney one way, stop, go around the other direction. we knew it wasn't a fire spark since it was as big as a basketball or more, and it was summer time. i looked at my cousin and said my house is closer, do you want to come with me? he said no, i'm running home, which was approximately 1000 yards away, while i was 50 yards away from my house. we said nothing about it again. 

there are more inconstant, 2 more i recall, but will try to describe these later, or if you want to call and speak more of them, i would be happy to.
the reason why is i am now legally blind, stargardt disease/visually impaired, and is difficult for me at this time...
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Over my nieghbor's/aunt/uncle's house circling chimney stopping and starting several times

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving south on the 405 freeway from the town of san juan capistrano to my home in oceanside. it was around 930. i drive this frequently. between san onofre powers plant and oceanside,is a military base camp pendelton. i have observed military operation many time,and feel i can identify most of their vehicles.
 the ocean was to my right,and there was average traffic for that time of night.The light over the ocean i first noticed as i passed the power plant. it was so bright that it was distracting from my driving. i assumed i would pass it soon,but it stayed to my right as i continued driving. it reminded me of camera lights the kind they use in movies.Very white,bright. i continued driving maybe another 10 minutes,and kept glancing to my right.
i knew there was a look out up ahead nearing oceanside. i couldn't take it anymore,i had to pull over and look.
 i pulled into the look out. there was a family who where having car problems.Beside them it was just me,my dog,and no parking lot  lights. i stood there maybe 15 just looking at it. helicopters practice out there dropping supplies to ships. that was my first thought.I eliminated that,as there where no flashing red light,or movement.Plus i couldn't see a ship. maybe a oil derrick ? no, not unless they built it in a day. it wasn't any find of a ship or boat,as there was zero reflection on the water. the longer i looked, the more confused i got. i could barely see the horizon as there was fog that night.Once i could see the line i could tell the light wasn't sitting on the ocean,but was above. i kept waiting for it to move,and one time it jerked a little but remained it place.
 i would describe the light as a huge bright square.I could only see the front but it looked like it was dived evenly into four lights. like a 4 on dice..Each light put out the same white color,but  randomly fluttered. i wouldn't call it blinking.I finally had to get home so i don't know what happened with it. i have a young family member who said she saw the same thing a few nights later. her's were flying,& there was 8.That was in san clementa, at 1130 pm. i tried to use my cell phone for a picture,no luck.
content.summary: Ultra bright huge square over pacific ocean at nighti

content.detailedDescription: First object seen was a flash of light, then it started to move but looked like a star, then it flashed again while moving up and disappeared. second object seen was flashing white randomly while remaining stationary, a second object flashed near but flash was not as bright. then a glowing white object flew over my house, but was high in the sky. then we got scared and ran inside.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: First object seen was a flash of light then flew but kept its glow

content.detailedDescription:
I have always been pretty sure that we are not alone. i also have a bit of healthy scepticism.  for me to claim to have seen a ufo there had to be no "grey area"and beyond the shadow of doubt -period! probably won't happen...So i thought .
   my girlfriend and i were roller blading  at night becouse there is less  auto traffic.We were at an park near our house and noticed we could see all the way up the valley. it was a very clear night and we must have been on high ground. we could also see the cargo jets on .The final approch to mather field (formally mather a.F.B.). it was so clear we could see about seven jets , starting from one passing directly over our heads ,2 ,3,4,then 5 at the end of the valley banking to the right ,6 dessending  then the 7th touching down. actual "air traffic " very cool. then bam! as if the crafts cloking device suddenly failed we can see this craft so close i can see the panles and what looked like some markings like on military planes. take a pack of cigarettes turn it sideways and hold it at arms lenghth from you . that's the size . ok, strange but there are possible explainations. except for the fact that it was motionless - not hovering, but motionless. it's difficult to convey how odd it looks for somthing to be truly airborne and motionless. when it leaves, part of the craft stays until the forward portion gets to a certain point, then at the speed of light-its gone!
  about  week later i saw a program about scientist attempting to find absolute zero. on the way there they proved the einstine bolles condensate. they used a gas that was so dense it slows light to the speed of a bicycle. to demonstrate the shot a laser through a clearchamber of this gas. it behaived exactly like that craft accelerated as it took off.
content.summary: Watching the air traffic of cargo jets to mather field

content.detailedDescription: Lights in the sky shaped like diamonds... very large orange red glowing diamonds.. the  largest one seemed to slightly brighten and shift its positioning slowly becoming more inline with orions belt
content.summary: Same diamond shaped orange yellow lights, all three objects stayed in a large triangle just below orions belt in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: i was outside just looking at stars. a red glow caught my attention. standing still looking thru trees using branches as marker i saw they were moving. no wind or breeze. then i saw thy went in erratic directions and move 5-10 degrees with north being the origin and shifting 15 degrees to the west. when airplane closer to ground appeared under the red & altering white light the closest light would erratically move. circle, oval, straight line and fast. when the one light was moving the other 4 were stationary. my wife saw same thing. i was interested and watched for 1-1/2 hr. my wife only watched 15 munites. i gave up about 1:45 to go in and get ready for bed. no structured shape was evident. they were orange/red for 75% of the time the remainder they were more yellow. no wind tonight. this allowed me to use tree branches as marks to verify they were moving. lightening bugs were out but their light god on and off. the 5 objects never stopped glowing one of the colors.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 5 lights when 1 moved the other 4 remained stationary. when planes were under them the went in erratic circle-ovoal . they went all direction-fast

content.detailedDescription: My wife, daughter and i were outside the back of our house with our pet hamster letting him run on our driveway. i pointed up in the trees and said what's that? it was a group of three lights moving slowly over the horizon still in the trees. i moved over in our yard to a clearing to see the lights better. at first it looked like the chinese lanterns used during the fourth of july, but the stayed in a triangular shape with a slight variance to sphere or domed shape. it continued to move across the horizon and slowly ascended and moved back away from us and then dimmed out and was gone. this took about five minutes of time. my daughter was able to capture some of the lights on her ipad. my wife and daughter also saw the same lights hovering over the tree tops near the kc royals stadium in november last year.
content.summary: 3 lights in a triangular shape that pulsated with slight color changes.

content.detailedDescription: My fiance and i were sittting on our back deck at 10pm on july 15, 2012, when we noticed 5 very bright orange lights traveling from the east heading west over blue springs. there were 2 in front side by side but with some space between them, and then they were 3 following behind in a triangular formation. after i first noticed them they were probally in the sky about 3 minutes. one by one starting in the front they flickered slightly and simply vanished into thin air one at a time until all 5 were not visible anywhere. mind you they didn't fly further away so that they faded into the distance and i did not see any clouds in the sky just stars. it was extremely strange. i tried my hardest to see some shape or something in the sky after they vanished to explain it, you know  like they were really still there, but they were not. i did see an airplane high up in the sky probally 5 minutes later, however that is the only other activity i saw in the sky for probally 5 minutes before and after.I simply lost sight of them when they vanished before my very eyes.
content.summary: Viewed 5 bright orange flying objects 2 in front, 3 following behind in triangular formation, then vanished one at a time with no trace into the night

content.detailedDescription: I was in my living room talking to my sister when i noticed out the front window a bright glowing orange object, just above the tree line.  the object appeared rather close and maybe the size of a dime.  i pointed it out and asked my sister if she saw it.  she saw it too, and i hurriedly ran outside while directing her to get her camera.  as i went outside it was slowly moving northeast and gaining altitude.  at first i thought it was a chinese paper lantern.  i realized this was not the case as it was moving side to side without gaining altitude, and would stop moving side to side whilst it was ascending.  it was moving far too fast to be a paper lantern, as well.  also, while it was moving side to side, it was glowing a dull, pulsing red-orange, and i could make out an overall disc shape to the object.  when it was ascending it was glowing a brighter yellow-orange, and the shape of the object was harder to make out.  i was really excited, and quickly moving down the street away from the tree line to keep track of it.  by the time my sister made it outside with the camera, it had already moved a considerable distance away, to the point where it became a star-like object and disappeared.  directly thereafter, we noticed 4 airplanes moving in the same direction, and they were travelling at a much lesser speed.  after covering most of the distance, 3 of the planes turned around and headed back in the direction they came.  my sister didn't get the camera in time, but saw enough to confirm that it was indeed a ufo, and actually was the first to notice the 3 additional planes in the vicinity.  we were both very excited, as we have both had ufo sightings, but never together.  it felt like confirmation, and totally was in line with the other ufo's we have sighted individually in the past several years.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright yellow-orange to dim red-orange with dark/gray disc saucer shaped body

content.detailedDescription: My daughter took a pic of her cat outside our home. i was nearby watching her do this. after a while she show me the pic and wanted me to see that an object was near the top of the pic. the tree in the background is dead and has no leaves on it. there was no plane flying by. it doesn't look like a bird either. so apparently it was not visible to our eyes but her digiatl camera was able to capture it flying by. she was facing south by southeast.
content.summary: Digital pic of object

content.detailedDescription: We were travleing east on i 69 just east of us 127 at 10:30 pm on july 14..We looked over to the south east and we seen a series of lights (8-10) in a large v formation..Glowing orange red ..Just kind of floating there..We watched it as we went east on 69 for about 3-5 min..Till we drove out of sight..As we watched it some of the lights seemed to blink or shimmer..And a couple of the light got closer to the one next to it..Before they were spaced out...It did not smeed to make any real fast changes in direction or elev...We have traveld that road thousands of times and it was not parking lights or airplanes....
content.summary: Traveling east on i 69 about half a mile east of us127 in the south/east sky ,  about 2500 hundred  ft high a series of 8-10 lights in a large v formation with the point of v facing up and west in sky...It kind of hung there as we travled east.

content.detailedDescription: 3 bright red-orange glowing balls, traveling pretty fast in a straight line, south to north.
content.summary: 3 seperate red-orange glowing balls, following eachother, about a minute apart, going in straight line south to north.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: We (two adults, one teenager)were sitting on our patio facing south, when we noticed a single odd-looking plane. the object moved slowly and silently from west to east, with no contrail. then we began to see more and more, they were not in a group or formation. they were all, however, moving towards the same area. a minute or two after seeing one, we'd occasionally see another object coming from the east and heading west, they would sometimes pass by another object heading west to east. they appeared to have no wings, and were entirely white except for what seemed to be a black spot directly in the center of the craft. these objects were cigar shaped and moved at a constant sustained speed. they were in an area of the sky that was unusual to see planes in, we live in a busy area for planes and we rarely see aircraft in this particular area or at their altitude. we did notice that birds seemed to be fleeing from the direction these objects were flying towards. we finally stopped watching when clouds covered the sky and it began to rain.
content.summary: Saw multiple silent, white, cigar shaped objects of identical size and size in differing altitudes.

content.detailedDescription: For over week the ufo emitting multiple colours has been witnessed every evening by myself and others for a number of hours. mufon can set up an observation point to observe it as i am certain it will continue to appear. the location is near mount etna which is a live volcano.  i have observed with telescope but it would be great to be able to observe and record it with proper equipment.
content.summary: For over week the ufo has been witnessed every evening by myself and others. mufon can set up an observation point to observe it as i am certain it will continue to appear. the location is near mount etna which is a live volcano.  observed with telescope

content.detailedDescription: Indian rock dam. man made concrete lined gully.That has small bridge crossing over it.And road that can be used to reach other locations in area. small town called york new salem. etc.,i was driving towards bridge. and could see very very large object in gully. what looked like a giant water tank. or silo laying on its side in gully.My first reaction was how did they and why. put that in there.I stopped on bridge. got out of car walked around car to passenger side to get a better look.I was still thinking to my self why was it put in there and how.Nothing scary just curious.It covered the majority of the gully to my front.I was just scanning from my front to the far end of it.What i will say is the top part.It just fit init width size.I leaned over some to view end below me. not far thou.Thats when i noticed movement below. what i thought were kids playing. that ran under bridge from my view.I just saw them for a second or two.Not long enough to get a good look. but they looked awkward to me.I got back in my car and drove off.Still wondering  what i had saw.The road i was on can be driven in a full circle about a mile or two back to bridge.I was so curious by now i drove back to get another look. it was gone.I dont want any reconition or  to get any. what i saw was real.Some kind of machine,if it wasnt for the fact that it was me who saw it.I did not beleive these these kind of stories in the past
content.summary: Large  metalic object on ground

content.detailedDescription: I went outside my home for a smoke. while i looked at the stars. there were plenty of visible stationary stars. everybody recognizes the flimsy flickering of a star. but as i looked directly up i saw a star that caught my eye. as soon as i started to stare at it it slowly moved from directly above me move northwest from my position. it hovered slowly then the orb got brighter and brighter and got bigger in dimension with the expanding light. it moved very unaturally and it had direct manipulation of the orb. then it flickered and faded into the blackness of the sky.I was definitely moved by this event and shook my core.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Unknown
content.summary: Ufo witnessed on 7/14/12 10:00pm. bright orb of light disguising as a star.

content.detailedDescription:
Approximately two weeks ago, i began noticing strange blue star-like objects outside of my home while standing on my porch. they appeared to be stars, but didn���t behave like any stars i have seen. they are visible at night, during the day, and currently visible right now as of 14jul12. i first took notice when i was looked up at the stars and was tracking what i thought was a satellite because it was moving fairly quickly through the sky. it changed directions, stopped, and the shot across the sky like a shooting star! i said to myself, " i must be going crazy because no way in hell that just happened right before my eyes". so i went inside to forget about what i say, but moments later i felt compelled to go back outside (like my mind was telling me to go back and look up), so i did. i noticed not one, but at least 6 objects during week 1. some were off doing their own thing while others grouped up and paired up forming shapes like diamonds, squares, v-patterns, and circles right in front of my eyes. they often separated going on what appears to be predetermined flight patterns after forming a shape. at times, they would pair up and chase another object. another thing i noticed is that when a single object approaches another object, they both start circling one another in an s-pattern, and then one would follow the other. week 2, the numbers doubled and then tripled. currently there are hundreds of these objects.

some core details i observed comprises these objects outshined the sun and are even visible through the clouds (at night and during the day). today, they appear to be flying around in a predetermined flight route as they make a large grid. they move slowly then progressively speed up leaving a tail like a comet. they also stop and then shoot across the sky like a shooting star then stop on a dime. from what i can make out, they have a preset vicinity for which they are staying in.

naturally i began filtering through possible explanation as to what these objects may be. my first thought was they may be satellites, but due to their intelligent and elegant maneuverability and flight patterns, i quickly dismissed this idea. another idea i explored, they may be some new kind of aircraft, but based on my observations and the fact these objects are extremely far away (i say low orbit) and computing the speed and maneuvers this object were displaying, our anatomy as human beings does not permit such a thing. i dismissed this idea extremely quickly. another thought that crossed my mind, perhaps they are meteors or some other type of similar object, but based on how intelligent, and apparent predetermined flight patterns and such, i had to throw this last idea out. i never seen a meteor shoot across the sky, stop, move at various different speeds, change directions in a uniformed fashion or in sharp turns, group with one or more other meteorites, etcetera��� i had to dismiss this idea.

update (i begin typing this yesterday 14jul15): 
today (15jul12), one object descended enough that i can honestly say it was long disc shaped. this object was shinning and reflecting the sun light (if that makes sense) at the same time. to be more accurate, the bottom of this object shinned like a star (like it was emitting or generating light) while the top of this object reflected light. i know the sun light was reflecting off of this object because you can visibly see the light move across the object as it propelled. it appeared to have a dark area located approximately near the rear of the object. i tracked this object as it made it's way through the blue sky over my home, but it progressively sped up and ultimately ascended so fast i dropped my drink i had in my hand. i noticed approximately three other objects converging on this one before this event occurred. furthermore, there was no sound from this object nor was there visible "exhaust" or fumes coming from this object. 

in my honest assessment, i think these objects are fighting one another. my friend and i noticed 2 objects chasing each other, and then a bright light, and then nothing... only one object remained. why is that significant is because in my observations, these objects do not disappear. they may become brighter (descend) or become dimmer (ascend), but they are always visible.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 24+ star-like objects visible with the naked eye during day and night time periods
